docs.snippet: HOLLYWOOD, Calif., Feb. 22 Don Hartman, writer-producer-director at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, will move to Paramount as chief production executive at that studio under Y. Frank Freeman, vice president of the company, if current negotiations are...
docs.lead_paragraph: HOLLYWOOD, Calif., Feb. 22 Don Hartman, writer-producer-director at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, will move to Paramount as chief production executive at that studio under Y. Frank Freeman, vice president of the company, if current negotiations are successfully concluded.
docs.abstract: D Hartman seeks contract release to join Paramount

headline.main: HARTMAN LEAVING METRO FILM POST; Writer-Producer Is Negotiating for Chief Production Spot at Paramount Studios Of Local Origin

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Feb. 23-- The United Nations Economic and Social Council today sent the draft Covenant on Human Rights and measures of implementation back to the Commission on Hurnan Rights for revision.
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Feb. 23-- The United Nations Economic and Social Council today sent the draft Covenant on Human Rights and measures of implementation back to the Commission on Hurnan Rights for revision.
docs.abstract: sends draft and implementation measures to Human Rights Comm for revision

headline.main: U.N. SET TO REVISE TREATY ON RIGHTS; Council in Chile Votes to Have Originating Body Rewrite the Draft Covenant

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: SAO PAULO, Brazil--These are big days in the southern part  of South America and the traveling Norteamericano can indulge his hobbies, be they politics or pole-vaulting, thanks to a series of special international events be ginning this month and...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAO PAULO, Brazil--These are big days in the southern part of South America and the traveling Norteamericano can indulge his hobbies, be they politics or pole-vaulting, thanks to a series of special international events be ginning this month and running through much of next.

headline.main: BUSY WEEKS AHEAD FOR SOUTH AMERICA; Film Festival Two More Capitals Rio to Santiago

byline.original: By MILTON BRACKERPan American World Airways

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 24 (UP)--Edward G. Miller Jr., Assistant United States Secretary of State, arrived today from Brazil to attend the inauguration Thursday of President-elect Andres Martinez Trueba.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Feb. 24 (UP)--Edward G. Miller Jr., Assistant United States Secretary of State, arrived today from Brazil to attend the inauguration Thursday of President-elect Andres Martinez Trueba.
docs.abstract: Asst Sec Miller arrives for Pres-elect Martinez Trueba inaugural
